secret_rule: Only items that are commonly found in a supermarket can be brought to the picnic.

This guess continues to test the hypothesis that the rule involves consumable items, but introduces a new type of food item to gather more information about the potential rule.

Based on the examples and successful guesses, here's my final rule guess:

The rule appears to be: "Consumable items can be brought to the game"

My reasoning:
- All successful items have been consumable products:
  1. Bread (solid food)
  2. Apple juice (liquid)
  3. Milk (liquid)
  4. Water (liquid)
  5. Orange (fresh produce)
  6. Cheese (dairy product)
  7. Yogurt (dairy product)

The items span different categories:
- Liquids
- Solid foods
- Dairy products
- Fresh produce
- Processed foods

The common thread is that ALL items are edible or drinkable. They represent various types of consumable products that humans can eat or drink.

The rule seems to be very broad, encompassing almost any food or beverage item, regardless of its form, origin, or specific type.

So my final rule submission is: "Any consumable item can be brought to the game."
